00048 static int ctk_memalign(void **memptr, size_t alignment, size_t size);
00049 
00055 static void ctk_free_align(void *ptr);
00056 
00057 static inline int ctk_memalign(void **memptr, size_t alignment, size_t size)
00058 {
00059     void *p = (void *)malloc(size + sizeof(void*) + alignment - 1);
00060 #if !defined(__SPU__) || defined(DEBUG)
00061     if (! IS_POWEROF2(alignment))
00062         return CTK_ERROR_BAD_ALIGNMENT;
00063 #endif /* !SPU || DEBUG */
00064     if (p) {
00065         *memptr = int2ptr(ALIGN_UP(ptr2int(p) + sizeof(void*), alignment));
00066         *((void **)(*memptr)-1) = (void *)(p);
00067     } else {
00068         return CTK_ERROR_NO_MEMORY;
00069     }
00070     return CTK_SUCCESS;
00071 }
00072 
00073 static inline int ctk_memalign_realloc(void **memptr, size_t alignment, size_t size)
00074 {
00075     void * real = NULL;
00076     if (*memptr) {
00077         real = *((void **)(*memptr)-1);
00078     }
00079     void *p = (void *)realloc(real, size + sizeof(void*) + alignment - 1);
00080 #if !defined(__SPU__) || defined(DEBUG)
00081     if (! IS_POWEROF2(alignment))
00082         return CTK_ERROR_BAD_ALIGNMENT;
00083 #endif /* !SPU || DEBUG */
00084     if (p) {
00085         *memptr = int2ptr(ALIGN_UP(ptr2int(p) + sizeof(void*), alignment));
00086         *((void **)(*memptr)-1) = (void *)(p);
00087     } else {
00088         return CTK_ERROR_NO_MEMORY;
00089     }
00090     return CTK_SUCCESS;
00091 }
00092 
00093 static inline void ctk_free_align(void *ptr)
00094 {
00095     void * real;
00096 
00097     if (ptr) {
00098         real = *((void **)(ptr)-1);
00099         free(real);
00100     }
00101 }

00132 static inline void *ctk_malloc_align(size_t size, size_t alignment) __attribute__((always_inline));
00133 static inline void *ctk_malloc_align(size_t size, size_t alignment)
00134 {
00135     void *p = NULL;
00136     int ret = ctk_memalign(&p, alignment, size);
00137     if (ret == 0)
00138         return p;
00139     return NULL;
00140 }
00141 
00150 static inline void *ctk_realloc_align(void *p, size_t size, size_t alignment) __attribute__((always_inline));
00151 static inline void *ctk_realloc_align(void *p, size_t size, size_t alignment)
00152 {
00153     int ret = ctk_memalign_realloc(&p, alignment, size);
00154     if (ret == 0)
00155         return p;
00156     return NULL;
00157 }

00165 #define ctk_alloca_align(_retptr_, _size_, _alignment_)  \
00166     char CTK_UNIQ_NAME(_tmp_ ## _retptr_) [ALIGN_UP((_size_), (_alignment_)) + (_alignment_)]; \
00167     _retptr_ = (void*)ALIGN_UP_PTR(CTK_UNIQ_NAME(_tmp_ ## _retptr_), (_alignment_));
00168 #if 0
00169 static inline void *ctk_alloca_align(int _size_, int _alignment_) {
00170     void *ptr = alloca(ALIGN_UP((_size_), (_alignment_)) + (_alignment_)); 
00171     return (void*)ALIGN_UP_PTR(ptr, (_alignment_));
00172 }
00173 #endif

00177     _retptr_ = (_type_)ALIGN_UP_PTR(CTK_UNIQ_NAME(_tmp_ ## _retptr_), (_alignment_));
